H0.text: Which common colour can also be known as heliotrope. Blue

H1.text: Which common colour can also be known as heliotrope. Green

H2.text: Which common colour can also be known as heliotrope. Red

H3.text: Which common colour can also be known as heliotrope. Purple

A4.text: The classic bloodstone is translucent to opaque green chalcedony and red jasper

A5.text: Other colors of chalcedony may also occur in Indian bloodstone, such as white, yellow, or blue
